description:
Tree works in rear garden subject to TPO (Olive Section House) No.145 1995. T2 on map, T11 under order:  Plane:  Reduce by three metres crown towards flats.  Reduce extent of limb by three metres with cavity of base. Make inspection of remainder of tree. 

 T3 on map, T10 under Order: Norway maple: shorten lateral branches by two metres all round. 

 T4 on map T8 on Order:  Plane:  Reduce back to decrease competition from neighbouring trees.  Reduce back from flats.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
